description:
Data is envious of Fire’s Scarlet Dragon and starts wanting a powerful dragon of his own.  Pandora, who has been watching this whole time, gives Data an interesting wager!  If Data wins, he gets a dragon of his own, but if he loses he must give up one of his own cards to Pandora!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Trial of the Blue Dragon
ブルードラゴンの試練
